channel.title: Does Discuss have an RSS or Atom feed?
channel.description:
Does the software used to host Discuss have a hidden RSS or Atom feed I can subscribe to to get notifications of new posts?
Thanks, David

item.title: Does Discuss have an RSS or Atom feed?
item.dc:creator: David_Megginson
item.description:
Brilliant—thanks, @andylolz! I tried a few guesses, including /feed.rss and /feed.atom, but didn’t think of /posts.rss.

Read full topic
item.source: Does Discuss have an RSS or Atom feed?

item.title: Does Discuss have an RSS or Atom feed?
item.dc:creator: andylolz
item.description:
It does indeed – it’s here: https://discuss.iatistandard.org/posts.rss

It’s embedded in the metadata of the latest posts page, but not the categories page (which is now the homepage.)

For iatistandard dot org, I generated one using a third party service: http://fetchrss.com/rss/5d1107138a93f8ec7a8b45675d1106e28a93f8f0778b4567.xml

Read full topic
